title: Pembroke Bakery and Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Eclectic bakery and deli. All the baked goods are vegan and many are also gluten free: breads, bagels, rolls, cookies, cakes, pies, pastries, puddings and brownies. No butter, milk, eggs or any other animal product in any baked goods. Offers daily soups (at least one is vegan), rice and beans, sandwiches, hummus, vegan Daiya cheese. In-house-made vegan sausage and baked tofu. Uses organic and local ingredients whenever possible. Location is in a busy downtown business and arts district.
